Name: Guacamole
Description: White Bread for the bread machine. Plain, simple, gets the job done, and is good.
Directions: In a medium bowl, mash together the avocados, lime juice, and salt.
Mix in onion, cilantro, tomatoes, and garlic. Stir in cayenne pepper. Refrigerate 1 hour for best flavor, or serve immediately.
Refrigerate 1 hour for best flavor, or serve immediately.
